DevOps Engineer

Graphic Designer

Hello! I am DevOps Engineer from Kyiv, Ukraine. I used to be a graphic designer, but I stopped enjoying it and decided to become a devops engineer.
Contact Me
About Me
My story

By education I am a programmer, but I never liked programming, so after graduating from college I decided to move towards graphic design (since childhood I love to draw).

Unfortunately after 15 years of work as a graphic designer I did not enjoy this profession and I decided to look for something else. I have always had a taste for computers, I love to configure, install software and trabelshooting. So Devops is something that satisfies all my interests.

Projects
What I Do
Cloud
Services

Working with cloud services.

Cisco
Packet Tracer

Working with computer networks, knowledge of Cisco Packet Tracer.

Ansible
Playbook

Can write Ansible playbook to automate deployment and routine tasks.

Docker
CI/CD

Packaged sites in Docker for future updates, set up CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins for continuous delivery of web application updates.

Amazon
Web Services

I have experience with AWS, EC2, S3 services, RDS databases, VPS networks, Route 53, IAM, CloudFront, CloudWatch.

Web-site
Deploy

I have my own website https://kostanproff.com built on Jekyll engine on AWS S3 bucket with my domain connected via Route53 and created SSL certificate in Certificate Manager connected to website via CloudFront. Configured auto-deploy in Github Actions: https://github.com/KostanPROFF/online-cv

Terraform
infrastructure

Deployed infrastructure using Terraform to create WordPress on AWS. To do this I created 2 EC2 instances, in different availability zones using VPC networks, RDS database, LoadBalacer for load balancing, connected EFS for data storage and backup, load metrics were collected using CloudWatch. The code is available on GitHub: https://github.com/KostanPROFF/terraform_aws_wordpress

Kubernetes
cluster

Created a local Kubernetes cluster using Vagrantfile on VirtualBox: https://github.com/KostanPROFF/mirantis_task_for_devops_intern
